summary: Ecuador is a country in South America, with its capital in Quito. It borders Colombia and Peru and has a coastline along the Pacific Ocean. The country also includes the Galápagos Islands. Ecuador was once home to various indigenous groups and later became part of the Inca Empire and then the Spanish Empire. It gained independence in 1820. Today, Ecuador is a democratic republic with a diverse population, speaking Spanish and other native languages. The economy relies on exporting oil and farm products. Ecuador is known for its rich biodiversity, especially in the Galápagos.
title: Ecuador
